# IV. Analysis
```{r, echo=FALSE}
################################################
##########IV. Analysis##########################
################################################
# Linear regression
co2.model = lm(sqrt(CO2_RUNEX) ~ Total.VMT + as.character(Fuel) + 
                           as.character(Model.Year) + as.character(Region) +
                           as.character(Speed), data = pollution)
# Diagnostic plots on first model
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(co2.model)
ch4.model = lm(sqrt(CH4_RUNEX) ~ Total.VMT + as.character(Fuel) + 
                           as.character(Model.Year) + as.character(Region) +
                           as.character(Speed), data = pollution)
# Diagnostic plots on second model
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(ch4.model)
n2o.model = lm(sqrt(N2O_RUNEX) ~ Total.VMT + as.character(Fuel) + 
                           as.character(Model.Year) + as.character(Region) +
                           as.character(Speed), data = pollution)
# Diagnostic plots on third model
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(n2o.model)
```
